Rabi g le greatet nelal ka co ordinater bhanam ya adhyakxa phanindra nepal g laai pani interview ma bolaunu paryo ani greater nepal ko maag laai ra scope laai agadi badhaunu paryo .nepal ko lagi euta raamro pahal garna khojeko deah premi phanindra nepal ko kura janta samakxa puryaunu jaruri jasto lagxa ra rabi g pani euta desh premi byaktut le pani euta singo nepal ko mudda ko kura ma acyion linu jaruri xa .janta ko hak adhikar ra crime laai solve garnu bho dherai aba desh ko hak adhikar ko lagi pani pahal garna paryo nepal 60 hajar barga bhumi india le chalbhog gareko xa aafnai ho bhani daabi pani garxa .k ho ta yesto kura .euta desh le paaune adhikar ko jagga na line ta sarkar le ,3 crore janta ko bhumi jun euta greater nepal ho ani k tyo sab shikarik kura na paaume ta nepal le .yesko nichod niskarsa dina paryo .aba yo desh kai lagi euta revoulution ko kura ho .manxe sanga haina ki euta desh sanga nai bhayeko anyay bahyeko kura ma nepal sarkar chup kina .kina gumeko jamin na khojeko ho
